title: The Deadly Magnolia
description:
With her Gone With the Wind themed wedding, her handsome young husband and her massive mansion, it seemed that beautiful bride Pat Allanson had achieved her dream of becoming a real-life Scarlett O’Hara. But two months later, her husband's parents were gunned down in a horrific double murder. And soon, more people started dropping dead around the sweet Southern belle...

Source materials for this episode cannot be listed here due to character limitations. For a full list of sources, please visit https://redcollarpodcast.com/
